caption.title: Self-assembly mode of surface (SR-Au-SR) staples.
caption.p: ( A) Side view, ( B) top view, and ( C) rotated view of the ring-like assembled staples on the surface; different groups of gold atoms are colored in red, blue, and yellow, respectively. ( D) Exhibition of the five paralleled staples at the vertex peaks of a penta-star. ( E) Side view and ( F) top view of the chiral ring-like assembled staples. The white arrows indicate the orientation of each ring. Alkyl groups are omitted for clarity.
